good - have that too: you have to rmmod ndiswrapper, rmmod acx_pci, then modprobe ndiswrapper again

so it came on? if so, add "acx_pci" to /etc/hotplug/blacklist

that's the name of the network you are trying to connect to

run "iwlist"
if your using a linksys router/switch, it might be called "linksys", assuming it hasnt been changed

makes ndiswrapper load at boot
